features: Drive with Baby in Sight - Drive with peace of mind knowing your baby is safe in the back. Leo & Ella’s rear-facing car mirror for baby features a larger convex and fully rotational design. It can be rotated 360°, and it gives a clear view of your infant from any angle.
Made Safe for Baby - The design of our baby car mirrors follows safety measures for your little passenger. Each backseat mirror is made heat-resistant and smooth on the surface.

Exceptional Quality - This baby car mirror uses ABS shatterproof acrylic glass with a thick matte border and a double-secure strap system. The extra-strong padded mount ensures that the car mirror is firmly fastened to the headrest, keeping your baby safe during the ride.

No Assembly Needed - Our baby car seat mirror offers a quick and easy installation in under 30 seconds. Each car seat mirror comes fully assembled and ready to use, ideal for parents who are always on-the-go. Just tie and adjust the straps to secure the car mirror, and you’re all set!

Safety-Tested - Unlike substandard baby car accessories that pose a danger to your child, this baby mirror is safe and functional for daily commutes and long drives. Our baby essentials are crafted and inspected to ensure the highest levels of safety in case of a crash.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Leo & Ella’s Baby Car Mirror gives you the confidence you need for a safe car journey. It’s safe and stable as it gives you a head-to-toe view of your precious baby.

Your Baby’s Travel Companion Our infant car mirror fuse style, safety, and functionality. We use premium materials to solve many problems that regular mirrors have, so you and your little one can enjoy your road trips safely and comfortably. Safe and Reliable At Leo & Ella, we mass produce and safety inspect our products in Germany and USA. For products that need extra safety measures, such as this baby car mirror, we had them checked for crash-readiness in Europe. Stays in Place We understand how frustrating a rear-facing car seat mirror can be. Just when you have a perfect position, a bump in the road or a kid not paying attention can easily knock it out of place. That’s why we bring you a secure and stable baby rear view mirror for car. It comes with adjustable double straps and a padded mount, so it stays in position during the whole trip.

Take Part in Supporting Mothers Our company believes helping mothers in North America is the best way we can give back. Each year, we find mothers who are in need of financial support to raise their kids. For every Leo & Ella car mirror or baby car accessory you buy, a portion of the profits goes to helping moms in local areas. You get to enjoy a premium quality product, and we help a mother look forward to a brighter future. Leo & Ella - your high-end products for babies on the go!

Leo&Ella Large Baby Car Mirror Leo&Ella Small Baby Car Mirror Leo&Ella Large Baby Car Mirror for Tesla and Fixed Headrest Leo&Ella Baby Car Monitor Others Size Large Small Large 5" screen Small Installation 30 seconds 30 seconds 10 second 2 minutes 1 minute Attachment Style Double Straps with Buckle Double Straps with Buckle Patent-Pending Elastic Band Double Straps with Buckle Double Straps with Buckle Convex Wide View ✓ ✓ ✓ ✖ ✖ Fully Assembled ✓ ✓ ✓ Requires cable connection ✖ Rotate 360° and Tilts ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✖ Works for Rear-facing Car Seat ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Dimensions 11.5x7.5 inches 10x6.8 inches 11.5x7.5 inches 5" screen 9.5x6.5 inches Finish Matte Matte Matte Matte/Glossy Glossy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: It is easy to install. The mirror is a good size. I can easily see my daughter when I need too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are fantastic mirrors! Very nice quality and super sturdy. They are a breeze to install and adjust as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars New mom approved!
reviews.reviewText: I gave this to a new mama at work and she loves it. I wish I would’ve had one Way back when I had babies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good quality mirror
reviews.reviewText: This is a fairly large mirror, good size, where you can see your baby clearly. Easy to put on the back seat, with the adjustable straps, & you can angle it as you want. Overall very happy with the mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy installation and clear reflection
reviews.reviewText: It’s a pretty basic mirror just like any other with the clips. I do like that it is crash tested for car accidents. It’s the perfect size for our Suburban head rest. It does the job just fine and is safer than other ar seat mirrors. :)
